name: com.unity.tiny
description: Project Tiny enables you to create lightweight Web-based games using the Unity Editor.

samples.description: A sample project to demonstrate how C# code can interact with JS and back.
A puzzle game aims to show how to use inputs and make a drag and drop functionality.
A simple project illustrates how to make sprite rotating on screen over time
A sample project shows how to create a virtual UI joystick and use it to control character movements.
A sample project shows how to load, initialize and unload scenes.
A sample project shows how to setup a UILayout, do actions on the press of a button and handle a countdown timer.
